instruction: Please provide an overview of the recovery rates for auto-loan ABS and any changes that occurred within the year.
output: Recovery rates for auto-loan ABS improved overall throughout the year, with a dip in April due to lockdowns affecting used-vehicle sales. However, as transactions resumed in the summer, recovery rates returned to normal levels and further improved due to soaring used-vehicle prices in August and beyond. Recovery rates remained elevated until the end of the year.
